description: Using shop-bought pancakes makes this recipe simple and achievable even for young children in the kitchen.
name: Ham, Cheese & Broccoli Pancake Cannelloni Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 200g low-fat cream cheese with garlic and herbs

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 180°C. Grease a baking tray. Cook the broccoli in boiling water for 5 minutes. Drain.
Place the cream cheese and cream in a pan over a medium heat. Warm through, stirring, until the cream cheese has melted and the mixture is smooth. Stir in the broccoli, ham, and parmesan.
Place a pancake on a work surface and spread one-eighth of the filling over, seasoning with black pepper. Roll up and place on the baking tray. Repeat with the remaining pancakes and filling.
Sprinkle with mozzarella and breadcrumbs. Bake in the oven for 20 minutes. Serve the cannelloni hot with a green salad.
